responses: Scale ranges from 0-10 where 0 is least democratic and 10 most democratic.
notes: Average of Freedom House (fh_pr and fh_cl) is transformed to a scale 0-10 and Polity(p_polity2) is transformed to a scale 0-10. These variables are averaged into fh_polity2. The imputed version has imputed values for countries where data on Polity is missing by regressing Polity on the average Freedom House measure. Hadenius and Teorell (2005) show that this average index performs better both in terms of validity and reliability than its constituent parts.
name: e_fh_ipolity2
